title: "China's robotics industry maintains steady growth in H1"
excerpt: "China's robotics industry has been maintaining a stable growth trend with the production of industrial robots reaching 222,000 sets in the first half of this year, an increase of 5.4 percent on a yearly basis, reported CCTV.com on Wednesday."
